name: part_000
file: tmp_【チラ見せ枠_NIGHT】ときのそら New Year’s Party 2026『Dreams in Motion』 [ko7ypXM_-yQ]_gemini-3-pro-preview/reencoded/part_000.mov

scenes.description: Intro sequence with scrolling text of donor names and a static background.
Song performance by Tokino Sora. The visuals continue to show scrolling donor names.

subtitles.original: なんであなたにはできないの
subtitles.english: Why can't you do it?

subtitles.original: なんてさ 陰口言われたり 呆れられたり
subtitles.english: They say things like that, badmouthing me and giving up on me.

subtitles.original: 口角下がるってばいて
subtitles.english: I said my mouth corners are drooping, ouch.

subtitles.original: 電車は私を置き去りにしちゃうし
subtitles.english: And the train leaves me behind.

subtitles.original: 葉物野菜もスピード速すぎだね
subtitles.english: Leafy greens spoil way too fast, don't they?

subtitles.original: ありのままの素敵さだけじゃ足りないんだ
subtitles.english: Just being wonderful as I am isn't enough.

subtitles.original: 毎日死ぬほど頑張ってやっとここまで連れてきたんだ
subtitles.english: I worked myself to death every day to finally bring us this far.

subtitles.original: あなたには分からない
subtitles.english: You wouldn't understand.

subtitles.original: 分かってほしくない
subtitles.english: I don't want you to understand.

subtitles.original: 私の苦労も
subtitles.english: My hardships, too...

subtitles.original: 食い物かご存知ないで
subtitles.english: Don't you realize they're just fodder?

subtitles.original: いてね
subtitles.english: Just stay there.

subtitles.original: きっとあなたにもできるはず
subtitles.english: "You can surely do it too," they say.

subtitles.original: なんてさ 言うほど無責任にはなりたくない
subtitles.english: I don't want to be as irresponsible as those words imply.

subtitles.original: それでも死ぬほど頑張って賭ける値打ちはあると思った
subtitles.english: Still, I thought it was worth betting my life and working hard for.

subtitles.original: 投げ出したくなるよ
subtitles.english: It makes me want to throw it all away.

subtitles.original: でも諦めたくはない
subtitles.english: But I don't want to give up.

subtitles.original: 私の未来も
subtitles.english: My future, too.

subtitles.original: 失敗も全部私だけのもの
subtitles.english: My failures, all of it, belong only to me.

subtitles.original: あなたには分からない
subtitles.english: You wouldn't understand.

subtitles.original: 分かってほしくない
subtitles.english: I don't want you to understand.

subtitles.original: 私の苦労も
subtitles.english: My hardships, too...

subtitles.original: 食い物かご存知ないで
subtitles.english: Don't you realize they're just fodder?

subtitles.original: 投げ出したくなるよ
subtitles.english: I want to throw it all away.

subtitles.original: でも諦めたくはない
subtitles.english: But I don't want to give up.

subtitles.original: 私の未来も
subtitles.english: My future, too.

subtitles.original: 失敗も全部渡さないよ
subtitles.english: I won't hand over my failures, either.

subtitles.original: 気付かない 気付かないでいて
subtitles.english: Don't notice, please don't notice.

subtitles.original: 可愛いだけの私でいい
subtitles.english: Just "cute me" is fine.
